animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: Zebras are African equids known for their distinctive black-and-white striped coats.

animals.name: Mouse
animals.description: Mice are small rodents with a pointed snout and long tail.

animals.name: Lizard
animals.description: Lizards are reptiles with scaly skin, commonly found in various habitats.

animals.name: Dog
animals.description: Dogs are domesticated mammals known for their loyalty and companionship.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: Elephants are large mammals with trunks and tusks, known for their intelligence.

animals.name: Lion
animals.description: Lions are big cats known as the king of the jungle.

animals.name: Squirrel
animals.description: Squirrels are rodents known for their bushy tails and agility.

animals.name: Cow
animals.description: Cows are domesticated mammals raised for milk and meat.

animals.name: Seal
animals.description: Seals are marine mammals known for their streamlined bodies and aquatic abilities.

animals.name: Porcupine
animals.description: Porcupines are rodents with a coat of sharp quills for defense.

animals.name: Cat
animals.description: Cats are small domesticated mammals known for their agility.

animals.name: Crocodile
animals.description: Crocodiles are large aquatic reptiles known for their powerful jaws.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.description: Giraffes are the tallest terrestrial animals with long necks and legs.

animals.name: Koala Bear and Baby Koala Bear
animals.description: Koalas are marsupials native to Australia, known for their eucalyptus diet.

animals.name: Jaguar
animals.description: Jaguars are big cats with a distinctive coat.

animals.name: Kangaroo and Baby Kangaroo
animals.description: Kangaroos are marsupials native to Australia, known for their hopping movement.

animals.name: Hippopotamus
animals.description: Hippos are large, semi-aquatic mammals known for their aggressive nature.

animals.name: Rhino
animals.description: Rhinos are large herbivorous mammals known for their thick skin and horns.

animals.name: Pig
animals.description: Pigs are domesticated animals known for their intelligence and adaptability.

animals.name: Meerkat
animals.description: Meerkats are small mammals belonging to the mongoose family, known for their upright posture.

animals.name: Tortoise
animals.description: Tortoises are land-dwelling reptiles with a hard shell for protection.

animals.name: Horse
animals.description: Horses are strong animals often used for riding and transport.

animals.name: Rabbit
animals.description: Rabbits are small mammals known for their long ears and quick reproduction.

animals.name: Panda Bear
animals.description: Pandas are bears native to China, known for their black-and-white fur.

animals.name: Black Jaguar
animals.description: Black jaguars are a melanistic variant of jaguars, known for their dark fur and powerful build.

animals.name: Cheetah
animals.description: Cheetahs are the fastest land animals, known for their speed and agility.

animals.name: Gorilla
animals.description: Gorillas are large primates known for their strength and intelligence.

animals.name: Monkey
animals.description: Monkeys are primates known for their agility and playful nature.

animals.name: Polar Bear
animals.description: Polar bears are large carnivorous bears native to the Arctic.

animals.name: Springbok
animals.description: Springboks are antelopes known for their leaping behavior.

transport.name: Train
transport.description: A train is a series of connected vehicles that run on rails and transport passengers or goods.

transport.name: Car
transport.description: A car is a four-wheeled motor vehicle for personal transport.

transport.name: Motorbike
transport.description: A motorbike is a two-wheeled vehicle powered by an engine.

transport.name: Van
transport.description: A van is a medium-sized motor vehicle used for transporting goods or people.

transport.name: Ambulance
transport.description: An ambulance is a vehicle equipped to transport sick or injured people to medical facilities.

transport.name: Helicopter
transport.description: A helicopter is an aircraft with rotating blades that can take off and land vertically.

transport.name: Mini Bus
transport.description: A minibus is a smaller bus designed for transporting fewer passengers.

transport.name: Bus
transport.description: A bus is a large vehicle used for public transport of passengers.

transport.name: Boat
transport.description: A boat is a watercraft used for transportation, fishing, or recreation.

transport.name: School Bus
transport.description: A school bus is a vehicle used to transport students to and from school.

transport.name: Fire Truck
transport.description: A firetruck is a vehicle designed to assist in fighting fires.

transport.name: Pick-Up Truck
transport.description: A pickup truck is a light motor vehicle with an open rear cargo area.

transport.name: Wheel Chair
transport.description: A wheelchair is a chair with wheels, used by people who have difficulty walking.

transport.name: Jeep
transport.description: A jeep is a rugged vehicle often used for off-road travel.

transport.name: Jetski
transport.description: A jetski is a small, fast watercraft used for recreation.

transport.name: One Wheeler
transport.description: A one-wheeler is a single-wheeled motorized vehicle, often used for personal transport.

transport.name: Cruise Liner
transport.description: A cruise ship is a large passenger ship used for pleasure voyages.

transport.name: Police Car
transport.description: A police car is a vehicle used by law enforcement for patrol and response.

transport.name: Foot Scooter
transport.description: A foot scooter is a human-powered vehicle with a handlebar, deck, and wheels.

transport.name: Three Wheel Taxi
transport.description: A three-wheel taxi is a small motorized vehicle used for public transport.

transport.name: Airplane
transport.description: An airplane is a powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces.

transport.name: Bicycle
transport.description: A bicycle is a human-powered vehicle with two wheels, used for transportation or recreation.

transport.name: Rickshaw
transport.description: A rickshaw is a three-wheeled vehicle, often pulled manually or motorized.

transport.name: Motor Scooter
transport.description: A motor scooter is a lightweight, two-wheeled motorized vehicle.

transport.name: Crane Truck
transport.description: A crane truck is a vehicle equipped with a crane for lifting heavy objects.

transport.name: Ice Cream Van
transport.description: An ice cream van is a vehicle used to sell ice cream.

transport.name: Trailer Truck
transport.description: A trailer truck is a large vehicle used for transporting goods over long distances.

transport.name: Horse
transport.description: Horses have been used historically for transportation and pulling carriages.

transport.name: Mobile Camper
transport.description: A mobile camper is a vehicle equipped with living quarters for travel and camping.

transport.name: Car Transporter Truck
transport.description: A truck designed for carrying multiple cars.

clothing.name: Cap
clothing.description: A cap is a type of headwear with a visor, often worn for casual or sports purposes.

clothing.name: Socks
clothing.description: A sock is a piece of clothing worn on the feet, often under shoes.

clothing.name: Shoes
clothing.description: A shoe is a type of footwear worn to protect and comfort the foot.

clothing.name: Jacket
clothing.description: A jacket is a garment for the upper body, designed for warmth or style.

clothing.name: Underpants
clothing.description: Underpants are garments worn under clothing to cover the lower body.

clothing.name: Sweater
clothing.description: A sweater is a knitted garment for the upper body, often worn in cold weather.

clothing.name: Sneakers
clothing.description: Sneakers are comfortable shoes designed for sports and casual wear.

clothing.name: T-Shirt
clothing.description: A T-shirt is a lightweight, casual garment with short sleeves.

clothing.name: Dress
clothing.description: A dress is a one-piece garment worn by women or girls, covering the upper and lower body.

clothing.name: Jeans
clothing.description: Jeans are a type of pants made from denim, popular for casual wear.

clothing.name: Hoodie
clothing.description: A hoodie is a sweatshirt with a hood, popular for casual wear.

clothing.name: Shirt
clothing.description: A shirt is a garment for the upper body, typically with a collar and buttons.

food.name: Pizza
food.description: Pizza is an Italian dish consisting of a usually round, flat base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients.

food.name: Sandwich
food.description: A sandwich is a food typically consisting of vegetables, sliced cheese or meat, placed on or between slices of bread.

food.name: Hamburger
food.description: A hamburger is a sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat, usually beef, placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.

food.name: Chicken
food.description: Chicken is a type of poultry that is commonly consumed as a source of protein.

food.name: Soup
food.description: Soup is a liquid dish made with vegetables, meat, or fish, served hot or cold.

food.name: Tacos
food.description: Tacos are a traditional Mexican dish consisting of a folded or rolled tortilla filled with various ingredients like meat, beans, and vegetables.

food.name: Kebab
food.description: Kebab is a dish consisting of pieces of meat, fish, or vegetables roasted or grilled on a skewer or spit.

food.name: Fish and Chips
food.description: Fish and chips is a popular dish consisting of fried fish and deep-fried potato slices.

food.name: Spaghetti
food.description: Spaghetti is a long, thin, cylindrical pasta of Italian origin, typically served with a sauce.

food.name: Salad
food.description: Salad is a dish consisting of a mixture of various ingredients such as vegetables, fruits, nuts, and dressings, often served cold.

treats.name: Waffles
treats.description: Waffle is a light, crisp, batter-based cake cooked between two patterned plates.

treats.name: Chocolates
treats.description: Chocolates are sweet treats made from roasted and ground cacao beans.

treats.name: Cake
treats.description: Cake is a sweet baked dessert, usually made with flour, sugar, eggs, and butter.

treats.name: Ice Cream Cones
treats.description: Ice cream cones are a popular treat consisting of a scoop of ice cream served in a cone-shaped wafer.

treats.name: Milk Shake
treats.description: A milk shake is a sweet, cold beverage made from milk, ice cream, and flavorings or sweeteners.

treats.name: Strawberry Ice Cream
treats.description: Strawberry ice cream is a frozen dessert made from sweetened milk or cream and flavored with strawberries.

treats.name: Cookies
treats.description: Cookies are small, sweet, baked treats often containing ingredients like chocolate chips, nuts, or dried fruit.

treats.name: Chocolate
treats.description: Chocolate is a sweet, brown food made from roasted and ground cacao seeds.

treats.name: Doughnuts
treats.description: Doughnuts are fried dough confections, often sweet and round with a hole in the center.

treats.name: Lollipops
treats.description: Lollipops are sweet candies on a stick, often enjoyed by children.

treats.name: Cotton Candy
treats.description: Cotton candy is a fluffy, sweet treat made from spun sugar, often enjoyed at fairs and carnivals.

treats.name: Sweets
treats.description: Sweets are confections made with sugar or other sweeteners, often enjoyed as a treat.

fun-things.name: Balls
fun-things.description: Balls are spherical objects used in various games and sports.

fun-things.name: Kite
fun-things.description: A kite is a lightweight frame covered with paper or cloth, flown in the wind at the end of a long string.

fun-things.name: Rubber Duck
fun-things.description: A rubber duck is a toy shaped like a duck, typically used during bath time.

fun-things.name: Tricycle
fun-things.description: A tricycle is a three-wheeled vehicle, often used by young children.

fun-things.name: Top
fun-things.description: A top is a toy that can be spun on an axis, balancing on a point.

fun-things.name: Books
fun-things.description: Books are collections of written or printed pages bound together, used for reading and learning.

fun-things.name: Paints and Paint Brushes
fun-things.description: Paints and paint brushes are used for creating art and expressing creativity.

fun-things.name: Balloons
fun-things.description: Balloons are inflatable decorations often used for parties and celebrations.

fun-things.name: ABC Blocks
fun-things.description: ABC blocks are educational toys that help children learn letters and words.

fun-things.name: Kid's Car
fun-things.description: A kid's car is a small model vehicle, typically for children to play with.

fun-things.name: Jigsaw Puzzle
fun-things.description: A jigsaw puzzle is a game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge.

fun-things.name: Guitar
fun-things.description: A guitar is a musical instrument with strings, played by strumming or plucking.

fun-things.name: Chess
fun-things.description: Chess is a strategic board game played between two players.

fun-things.name: Lego
fun-things.description: Lego is a construction toy consisting of interlocking plastic bricks.

fun-things.name: Dominoes
fun-things.description: Dominoes are small rectangular tiles used in various games.

fun-things.name: Marbles
fun-things.description: Marbles are small spherical objects used in various games.

fun-things.name: Roller Skates
fun-things.description: Roller skates are shoes with wheels attached for skating.

fun-things.name: Building Blocks
fun-things.description: Building blocks are toy components that can be assembled to build various structures.

vegetables.name: Tomatoes
vegetables.description: Tomatoes are a red, edible fruit commonly used in cooking.

vegetables.name: Lettuce
vegetables.description: Lettuce is a leafy green vegetable commonly used in salads.

vegetables.name: Red Onions
vegetables.description: Red onions are a type of onion with a mild, sweet flavor.

vegetables.name: Avocado
vegetables.description: Avocado is a creamy, green fruit often used in salads and spreads.

vegetables.name: Bell Peppers
vegetables.description: Bell peppers are a type of sweet pepper available in various colors.

vegetables.name: Cucumbers
vegetables.description: Cucumbers are a refreshing, green vegetable often used in salads.

vegetables.name: Potatoes
vegetables.description: Potatoes are a starchy tuber used in a variety of dishes.

vegetables.name: Cabbage
vegetables.description: Cabbage is a leafy green, red, or white vegetable used in many dishes.

vegetables.name: Peas
vegetables.description: Peas are small, round green seeds used in cooking.

vegetables.name: Carrots
vegetables.description: Carrots are a root vegetable often claimed to be the perfect health food.

vegetables.name: Pumpkin
vegetables.description: Pumpkin is a cultivar of winter squash that is round with smooth, slightly ribbed skin.

vegetables.name: Regular Onions
vegetables.description: Regular onions are a type of vegetable known for their pungent flavor and aroma.

vegetables.name: Broccoli
vegetables.description: Broccoli is an edible green plant in the cabbage family.

vegetables.name: Radishes
vegetables.description: Radishes are edible root vegetables with a peppery flavor.

vegetables.name: Corn/Mielie
vegetables.description: Corn, also known as mielie, is a cereal grain first domesticated by indigenous peoples in southern Mexico.

vegetables.name: Mushrooms
vegetables.description: Mushrooms are a type of fungi that are commonly used in cooking.

vegetables.name: Beets/Beetroot
vegetables.description: Beets, also known as beetroot, are a root vegetable known for their deep red color.

vegetables.name: Cauliflower
vegetables.description: Cauliflower is a vegetable that belongs to the same family as broccoli.

vegetables.name: Rice
vegetables.description: Rice is the seed of the grass species Oryza sativa or Oryza glaberrima.

vegetables.name: Pumpkin
vegetables.description: Pumpkin is a cultivar of winter squash that is round with smooth, slightly ribbed skin.

vegetables.name: Kohlrabi
vegetables.description: Kohlrabi is a biennial vegetable, a low, stout cultivar of wild cabbage.

vegetables.name: Chickpeas
vegetables.description: Chickpeas are a type of legume, also known as garbanzo beans.

vegetables.name: Garlic
vegetables.description: Garlic is a species in the onion genus, Allium.

vegetables.name: Dry Beans
vegetables.description: Dry beans are mature beans that have been dried and can be stored for long periods.

vegetables.name: Brussels Sprouts
vegetables.description: Brussels sprouts are small, leafy green buds that resemble miniature cabbages.

vegetables.name: Green Beans
vegetables.description: Green beans are the unripe, young fruit of various cultivars of the common bean.

vegetables.name: Chili Peppers
vegetables.description: Chili peppers are the fruit of plants from the genus Capsicum, known for their spicy flavor.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: An orange is a type of citrus fruit that is commonly eaten as food.

fruits.name: Apples
fruits.description: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

fruits.name: Pear
fruits.description: A pear is a fruit with a rounded base and tapering top, typically sweet and juicy.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants.

fruits.name: Guava
fruits.description: Guava is a tropical fruit with a strong aroma and a sweet, tangy flavor.

fruits.name: Pineapple
fruits.description: Pineapple is a tropical fruit with a tough outer rind and sweet, tangy flesh.

fruits.name: Lychee
fruits.description: Lychee is a tropical fruit with a sweet, floral flavor and a rough, red skin.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.description: A watermelon is a large fruit with a green rind and sweet, juicy red flesh.

fruits.name: Grapes
fruits.description: Grapes are small, round fruits that grow in bunches and can be eaten fresh or used to make wine.

fruits.name: Mango
fruits.description: A mango is a tropical stone fruit that has a sweet and tangy flavor.

fruits.name: Strawberry
fruits.description: A strawberry is a bright red, juicy, and sweet fruit with seeds on the outside.

fruits.name: Tangerine/Naartjie
fruits.description: Tangerine, also known as naartjie, is a small citrus fruit similar to a mandarin or tangerine.

fruits.name: Peach
fruits.description: A peach is a soft, juicy fruit with a sweet, tangy flavor and a stone inside.

fruits.name: Cherry
fruits.description: Cherries are small, round fruits that are typically red or black and have a pit in the center.

fruits.name: Nectarine
fruits.description: A nectarine is a smooth-skinned peach with a sweet and juicy flavor.

fruits.name: Kiwi
fruits.description: Kiwi is a small, fuzzy fruit with green flesh and tiny black seeds.

fruits.name: Granadilla
fruits.description: Granadilla is a type of passion fruit with a sweet, tangy flavor.

fruits.name: Coconut
fruits.description: A coconut is a large, brown, hard-shelled fruit with a white, edible interior.

fruits.name: Pawpaw
fruits.description: Pawpaw is a tropical fruit with a sweet, musky flavor and a soft, butter-like consistency.

fruits.name: Lemon
fruits.description: Lemon is a yellow citrus fruit known for its sour taste and high vitamin C content.

fruits.name: Pomegranate
fruits.description: Pomegranate is a fruit with a tough outer rind and sweet, juicy seeds inside.

fruits.name: Blackberry
fruits.description: Blackberries are small, dark purple fruits with a sweet and tart flavor.

fruits.name: Sweet Melon
fruits.description: Sweet melon is a type of melon with a sweet, juicy flesh.

fruits.name: Grapefruit
fruits.description: Grapefruit is a large citrus fruit with a slightly bitter and tangy flavor.

toys.name: Teddy Bear
toys.description: A teddy bear is a soft toy in the form of a bear, often used for cuddling.

toys.name: Doll
toys.description: A doll is a model of a human figure, typically of a baby or girl, used as a child's toy.

toys.name: Beach Bucket and Spade
toys.description: A beach bucket and spade set is used for playing in the sand, often at the beach.

toys.name: Toy Truck
toys.description: A toy truck is a small model vehicle, typically for children to play with.

toys.name: Lego
toys.description: Lego is a construction toy consisting of interlocking plastic bricks.

toys.name: Crayons
toys.description: Crayons are sticks of colored wax used for drawing and coloring.

toys.name: Jumping Ball
toys.description: A jumping ball is a large, inflatable ball used for bouncing and jumping.

toys.name: Stuffed Animals
toys.description: Stuffed animals are soft toys shaped like animals, often used for cuddling.

toys.name: Rings
toys.description: Rings are circular toys that can be used for various games and activities.

toys.name: Dumpster Truck
toys.description: A dumpster truck is a toy truck designed to simulate a real dumpster truck.

toys.name: Toy Rainbow
toys.description: A toy rainbow is a colorful toy that represents a rainbow.

toys.name: Train Engine
toys.description: A train engine is a toy that simulates a real train engine.

tools.name: Spanners
tools.description: Tools for tightening nuts and bolts

fun-activities.name: Hoola Hooping
fun-activities.description: Spinning a hoop around the waist

fun-activities.name: Swinging
fun-activities.description: Moving back and forth on a swing

nature.name: Arctic
nature.description: The Arctic is a cold, icy region at the northernmost part of Earth, home to polar bears and stunning ice landscapes.

nature.name: Mountain
nature.description: Mountains are large landforms that rise prominently above the surrounding land, offering breathtaking views and challenging hikes.

nature.name: Desert
nature.description: A desert is a barren area of landscape with little rainfall, known for its dunes, cacti, and extreme temperatures.

nature.name: Ocean
nature.description: The ocean is a vast body of salt water that covers the majority of Earth's surface, teeming with marine life.

nature.name: Jungle
nature.description: A jungle is a dense, tropical forest rich in biodiversity, filled with exotic plants and animals.

nature.name: Volcano
nature.description: A volcano is a mountain that erupts with molten rock, ash, and gases from Earth's mantle.

treats-and-food.name: Biscuits
treats-and-food.description: Biscuits are baked bread products, often sweet and crunchy, perfect for a snack.

treats-and-food.name: Burger
treats-and-food.description: A burger is a sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat or veggies placed inside a bun.

treats-and-food.name: Cake
treats-and-food.description: Cake is a sweet baked dessert often made with flour, sugar, eggs, and butter.

treats-and-food.name: Candy
treats-and-food.description: Candy is a sweet confection made with sugar, often colorful and fun to eat.

treats-and-food.name: Pizza
treats-and-food.description: Pizza is a savory dish made of a flat, round dough base topped with cheese, sauce, and other ingredients.

treats-and-food.name: Ice Cream
treats-and-food.description: Ice cream is a frozen dessert made from sweetened milk or cream, often flavored.

treats-and-food.name: Chocolate
treats-and-food.description: Chocolate is a sweet treat made from roasted and ground cacao beans.

treats-and-food.name: Donuts
treats-and-food.description: Donuts are fried dough confections, often sweet and round with a hole in the center.

treats-and-food.name: Soup
treats-and-food.description: Soup is a liquid dish made with vegetables, meat, or fish, served hot or cold.

treats-and-food.name: French Fries
treats-and-food.description: French fries are thin strips of deep-fried potatoes, often served with salt or ketchup.
